aboutSchool.title: About Our School
aboutSchool.description: Late. Surajbai Kisandas Kataria English Medium School and Jr. College Kalewadi has nurtured young minds for more than 20 years with a commitment to academic excellence, values-based education, and co-curricular growth.

heritage.title: Our Heritage
heritage.description: Located in Kalewadi Choufula, Kalewadi Taluka: Daund District: Pune, 431801, Late. Surajbai Kisandas Kataria English Medium School and Jr. College Kalewadi has been a beacon of quality education for over two decades. We provide a nurturing environment where students develop academically, socially, and emotionally.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We blend traditional values with modern teaching methodologies, ensuring that every student receives personalized attention and a well-rounded education that prepares them for the challenges of tomorrow.

community.title: Our Community
community.description: With a vibrant community of dedicated teachers, supportive parents, and enthusiastic students, we create a collaborative learning environment where every child can thrive and reach their full potential.

curriculum.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
curriculum.description: Aligned with CBSE & State Board standards, enriched with co-curricular activities

faculty.title: Experienced Faculty
faculty.description: Dedicated teachers committed to each student's academic and personal growth

infrastructure.title: Modern Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Well-equipped classrooms, labs, and facilities to support holistic learning

principalMessage.title: A Message from Our Principal
principalMessage.description: Words of wisdom and vision for our school community

message.paragraph1: It is with immense pride and pleasure that I welcome you to Late. Surajbai Kisandas Kataria English Medium School and Jr. College Kalewadi. For over two decades, our institution has been committed to providing quality education that goes beyond textbooks and examinations.
message.paragraph2: Our philosophy is rooted in the belief that every child is unique, gifted with individual talents and capabilities. Our dedicated team of educators works tirelessly to nurture these qualities, ensuring that each student receives personalized attention and guidance.
message.paragraph3: We strive to create an environment where academic excellence is balanced with character development, where innovation meets tradition, and where students are prepared not just for examinations, but for life itself.
message.closing: Together, let us build a future where our children emerge as responsible, compassionate, and successful global citizens.

testimonials.title: What Parents Say About Us
testimonials.description: Hear from our parent community about their experiences with Kataria English Medium School

cta.text: Join our growing family of satisfied parents

sampleTestimonials.name: Mrs. Priya Sharma
sampleTestimonials.text: Kataria School has been instrumental in shaping my daughter's academic journey. The teachers are incredibly dedicated, and the holistic approach to education has helped her develop both academically and personally. I'm extremely satisfied with the school's commitment to excellence.

sampleTestimonials.name: Mr. Amit Patil
sampleTestimonials.text: The infrastructure and facilities at Kataria School are outstanding. What impressed me most is the personalized attention each student receives. My son has shown remarkable improvement in his confidence and academic performance since joining this institution.

sampleTestimonials.name: Mrs. Sunita Deshmukh
sampleTestimonials.text: As a parent, I couldn't ask for a better school. The values-based education system, combined with modern teaching methods, has prepared my child for future challenges. The faculty goes above and beyond to ensure every student succeeds.

sampleTestimonials.name: Mr. Rajesh Kale
sampleTestimonials.text: The school maintains an excellent balance between academics and extracurricular activities. My daughter has discovered her passion for science and arts here. The supportive environment created by teachers and staff makes learning enjoyable.

sampleTestimonials.name: Mrs. Anjali Joshi
sampleTestimonials.text: Kataria School stands out for its commitment to individual student growth. The regular parent-teacher interactions keep us informed about our child's progress. The safe and nurturing environment gives us complete peace of mind.

footer.description: Empowering young minds with holistic education, strong values, and a future-ready mindset for over two decades.
